actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to disregard children's benefits received by an individual under the Social Security Act in determining whether that individual is a dependent of a taxpayer.

summary.text: Disregards children's benefits received by an individual under the Social Security Act in determining whether that individual is a dependent of a taxpayer for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 152(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to disregard children's benefits received by an individual under the Social Security Act in determining whether that individual is a dependent of a taxpayer.
